
{{alias}}( fcn[, ...args] )
    Returns a thunk.

    Parameters
    ----------
    fcn: Function
        Function to convert to a thunk.

    args: ...any (optional)
        Function arguments.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Function
        Thunk.

    Examples
    --------
    > var fcn = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/math/base/ops/add}}, 2, 3 );
    > var v = fcn()
    5
    > v = fcn()
    5

    See Also
    --------
